parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: feature
parameters.description: The entity query feature to perform. Supported features are `disambiguate` and `similar_entities`.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: A text string that appears within the entity text field.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Entity text to provide context for the queried entity and rank based on that association. For example, if you wanted to query the city of London in England your query would look for `London` with the context of `England`.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of results to return. The default is `10`. The maximum is `1000`.

parameters.name: evidence_count
parameters.description: The number of evidence items to return for each result. The default is `0`. The maximum number of evidence items per query is 10,000.
